item.description:
Buddha Hut will host a $10 all-you-can-eat vegan buffet. Come anytime between noon and 7ish and one dollar from every purchase goes to support VegWorcester programs.

I will be there at 2 in order to avoid the noon mayhem so hopefully I'll see you there.

Feel free to call me with any questions or concerns, 508-459-1074

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp August 15th Meetup
